AD_Gnoll001Howl.synopsis: The connection to the Gnoll Master has been broken and no player is available to start the dialog, so the Gnolls go immediatelly hostile to everyone.
AD_Gnoll001Howl.how_to_trigger: Without going into the Moonrise Kitchen, kill the Gnoll Master
